data.title: Suicide bomber hits stadium in Iraqi city, killing 29
Russian soldier surrounded by ISIS calls in airstrikes on himself

ISIS Appears to Be Close to Collapse: Front-line commanders no longer speak of a scarily formidable foe but of Islamic State defenses that crumble within days and fighters who flee at the first sign they are under attack.
Imam at Scotland's largest mosque praises extremist killer
16 people are missing after a Chinese news site ran a letter asking Xi Jinping to resign

Australian Rhino Project moving rhinoceros from Africa to protect against poaching - The first of up to 80 rhinoceros are on track to come to Australia this year as part of a world-first plan to ensure their survival
Brussels attacks: 'Explosion and gunfire heard' during police operations in Schaerbeek
The Ukrainian lawyer of captured Russian soldiers has been kidnapped, robbed, shot dead and buried
Google to warn Gmail users of ‘government backed attacks’ in new warnings as tech industry backs Apple in privacy fight
